Calculate Predicted Points using Down and Distance

cfb_metrics_ppa_predicted.Rd

Calculate Predicted Points using Down and Distance

cfb_metrics_ppa_predicted(down, distance)

Arguments

down

(Integer required): Down filter
distance

(Integer required): Distance filter

Source

https://api.collegefootballdata.com/ppa/predicted

Value

A data frame with 2 variables:

yard_line

integer.

predicted_points

character.

Examples


cfb_metrics_ppa_predicted(down = 1, distance = 10)
